text: Miriam Chaszczewacki or Miriam Chaszczewacka (1924â€“1942) was a 15-year old Jewish girl and Holocaust victim who in 1939 began keeping a personal diary about her life in the Radomsko ghetto which ended a few days before her death in 1942. title: Miriam Chaszczewacki
